title: Spirit Guardians
content:
Spirit Guardians Level 3 Conjuration Spell Call forth spirits to protect the area around you. Nearby enemies take 3~24 Radiant damage or 3~24 Necrotic damage per turn, and their movement speed is halved. On Save: Targets still take half damage. Caster can't become Invisible while concentrating on this spell. 10 turns 3m WIS Save Concentration Action Level 3 Spell Slot
